Pre-Game Insights: The Kansas City Royals host the Cleveland Guardians looking to end a three-game home slide.
The Royals lead the season series 7-4.
PITCHING PROBABLES: Guardians: Tanner Bibee (10-6, 3.65 ERA, 1.13 WHIP, 156 strikeouts); Royals: Brady Singer (9-9, 3.36 ERA, 1.24 WHIP, 147 strikeouts).
